mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPOINTMENT (ANO, ADATE, AP_COUNT, CNO, DSAUP_NO) VALUES (APPOINTMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(DSEAT, 0) - NVL((SELECT SUM(NVL(AP_COUNT, 0)) FROM APPOINTMENT WHERE DSAUP_NO=#{param1} AND ADATE = #{param2}), 0) FROM DEPARTMENT_INFO WHERE DSAUP_NO = #{param1}
